title: Market Close Report: NASDAQ Composite index closes at 7,874.16 down -88.72 points - Nasdaq.com
text: Tuesday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 7,874.16. The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.18 billion. Declining stocks led advancers by 2.47 to 1 ratio. There were 926 advancers and 2287 decliners for the day. On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 35 stocks reached a 52 week high and 73 those reaching lows totaled. The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks  page.

The   NASDAQ 100 index  closed down -1.06% for the day; a total of -81.49 points. The current value is 7,609.51. Alexion Pharmaceuticals, Inc. ( ALXN  ) had the largest percent change down (-5.54%) while The Kraft Heinz Company ( KHC  ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.12%.    The  Dow Jones index  closed down -1.08% for the day; a total of -285.26 points. The current value is 26,118.02. Boeing Company (The) ( BA  ) had the largest percent change down (-2.66%) while Pfizer, Inc. ( PFE  ) had the largest percent change gain rising 1.6%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
